vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.24;
son of: Hezron (H2696H) and Abiah (H0029J);
half-brother of: Ram (H7410), Jerahmeel (H3396), Caleb (H3612H) and Segub (H7687H); married to Helah (H2458) and Naarah (H5292B);
father of: Ahuzzam (H0275), Hepher (H2660), Temeni (H8488), Haahashtari (H0326), Zereth (H6889), Izhar (H3328), Ethnan (H0869) and Koz (H6976)
§ Ashur = "black"
son of Pharez
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Caleb; fundador de Tecoa; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞施戶 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "黑"
法勒斯的兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚施户 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "黑"
法勒斯的儿子
